title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-2.5 - Term of approval of provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-2.5 - Term of approval of provider

State Regulations
(a) A provider shall be approved for a period
of six years, except that the approved status of such providers may be
terminated during this term by the department in accordance with section
57-2.6
of this Subpart. (b) At the expiration of said term, a
provider may reapply to the department for approval following the requirements
of section
57-2.4
of this Subpart, including
payment of the required fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-2.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 24, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 52, eff. 12/24/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
